PAVEY Ralph Edgar of 14 New Oak Road, Finchley, London, N.2 died 8 Sep 1958 at Middlesex Hospital, London, W.1. Administration London 13 October 1958 to Elsie Sarah Pavey widow. Effects £477 7s. 4d.
